The video was also shared by Ashok Basoy: a former Congress student wing NSUI leader, further confirming its dissemination.
Alt News conducted a reverse image searc: a video verification tool, to authenticate the video's origin and determine its authenticity.
A 2019 report by Stomp: The Strait Times' citizen journalism portal, provided additional details about the incident, including the location (Taman Mutiara metro station in Kuala Lumpur) and the victim's injuries, as confirmed by Kuala Lumpur CID chief Senior Asst Comm Rusdi Md Isa.
